name: Darkflight Heart
effect: Your team counts as having 1 additional Darkflight. Gain an Aphelios.

name: Lagoon Heart
effect: Your team counts as having 1 additional Lagoon. Gain a Kai'Sa.

name: Soul Siphon
effect: Darkflights benefit from the top-most trait of the sacrificed unit. This does not increase the trait count for that trait.

name: Base Camp
effect: Scalescorns gain 8% damage each time they start combat in the same hex, stacking up to 4 times. Gain a Lillia.

name: Birthday Present
effect: Gain a 2-star champion every time you level up. The champion's tier is your level minus 4 (min: Tier 1).

name: Consistency
effect: Gain double streak gold.

name: Darkflight Crest
effect: Gain a Darkflight Emblem and a Rell.

name: Dragon Imperialist
effect: If you only have 1 Dragon, Dragons execute enemies they damage who are below 25% Health. Gain a Nomsy.

name: Dragonmancer Conference
effect: After combat with a player, a random Dragonmancer appears on your bench. Gain a Kai'sa.

name: Essence Theft
effect: Mages' attacks drain 8 Mana from their target and gain half of the drained Mana. Gain a Lux.

name: Hero-In-Training
effect: The Dragonmancer nearest to the Dragonmancer Hero gains 50% of the Dragonmancer trait's bonuses. Gain a Sett.

name: High Tide
effect: Until they cast 2 times, Lagoon champions have 30% reduced Attack Speed but gain 12 Mana per second. Gain a Kai'sa.

name: Lagoon Crest
effect: Gain a Lagoon Emblem and a Zac.

name: Oasis
effect: When Lagoon champions gain a shield, they remove all negative effects on themselves and heal for 20% of their missing Health.

name: Protectors Of The Cosmos
effect: Combat start: Your team gains a 30 Health shield for every item component equipped on an Astral Champion, including those that are part of a full item. Gain a Lux.

name: Scoped Weapons 1
effect: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain +2 Attack Range and 15% Attack Speed.

name: Terrify
effect: Your units take 15% less damage from enemies shrunken by Whispers champions. Gain a Sylas.

name: Age Of Dragons
effect: If you only have Dragons, every 5th attack from a Dragon fires a Dragonsoul blast that deals magic damage equal to 15% of their target's max Health. Gain a Nomsy, Zippy, and a random Tier 4 Dragon.

name: Darkflight Crown
effect: Gain a Darkflight Emblem, a Giant Slayer, and an Rengar.

name: Dragon Soul
effect: Your team counts as having 1 additional Dragon. Gain a Zippy.

name: Lagoon Crown
effect: Gain a Lagoon Emblem, a Spear of Shojin and a Zeri.

name: Lucky Gloves
effect: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions items that they can use well. Gain a Thief's Gloves.

name: Part-Time Assassins
effect: The Assassin trait grants its bonuses to your champions that start combat in the back 2 rows. This does not increase your number of Assassins. Gain a Kayn.

name: Ragewing Soul
effect: Your team counts as having 1 additional Ragewing. Gain a Guinsoo's Rageblade and a Rakan.

name: Scoped Weapons 2
effect: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain infinite Attack Range and 25% Attack Speed.

name: Woodland Charm
effect: Your highest Health champion is cloned. Clones cannot hold items.
